Articles.Content:
It would be cool if there were a way to control your kerbals from INSIDE the rocket, you can click a button to go into seats. and if the dev team is willing to do more work a way to interact with items inside the rocket like kerbal inventory systems but iva version or science experiments in the science module.

Edited November 20, 2017 by Jack5.exe

rasterPropMonitor and aset Iva's gives you hours of IVA gameplay and immersion

Edited November 20, 2017 by Agustin

1 minute ago, Agustin said:

rasterProp and aset Iva's gives you hours of IVA gameplay and immersion

I don't mean like that, I mean like the kerbals can get out of there seats and [user] can control them
There is a mod called FreeIva that does this function. Its in the very early stages however and many features are still being worked on.

I knew this idea was familiar, but it would make a cool realistic and stock feature
I thought of this idea one, day. It would also be nice to play around with Zero-G with balls and toys, and maybe even add acceleration/centrifugal force into the IVA for extra realism.
